# MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Options

**Structure**

An object that customizes how to perform a display request.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Overview

Use this object to configure the validation mode of the request.

## Structures

- **MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Options.ValidationMode**: A type that represents the validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Initializers

- **init(validationMode:)**: Creates a mobile document reader display request options type.

## Instance Properties

- **validationMode**: The validation mode of the mobile document request.

## Configuring the request details

- **region**: The region of the document you’re requesting.
- **elements**: The document elements you’re requesting.
- **MobileNationalIDCardDisplayRequest.Element**: A type that represents an element you can request from a mobile national ID card.
- **options**: An object that customizes how to perform a display request.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
